scripts.updateExtension: npm run upd:step01 && npm run upd:step02 && npm run upd:step03
scripts.upd:step02: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run handleErrors
scripts.upd:step03: cp -r dist/* extension/. && mv extension/index.html extension/popup.html
scripts.handleErrors: if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo 'Error occurred. Exiting...' && exit 1; fi
